ComicInfo.Title: Sweet Temptation
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 15:46:23. [Issue ID 37320]
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority
ComicInfo.Characters: Roger Hochberg,Sharon Carter (cameo flashback),Bernie Rosenthal,Captain America [Steve Rogers],Vermin (villain),Mia Carrera,Gail Runciter,Black Cat [Felicia Hardy] (cameo flashback),Spider-Man [Peter Parker]
ComicInfo.Writer: J.M. DeMatteis,J. M. DeMatteis,J. M. DeMatteis
ComicInfo.Summary: Sweet Temptation: Peter and his buddies are visiting a carnival when they run into Steve and Bernie on a date. Their good time is interrupted, however, by the villainous Vermin and Spidey and Cap have to fight through a veritable storm of rats and dogs to get to him. Vermin escapes and both Steve and Peter have their loves endangered by a little illicit temptation. With their love lives barely salvaged, Cap and Spidey find Vermin wrecking a grocery store and take him down.
